name: Game Over
overview: Far away in a different Galaxy, at a different time, control was exercised by an all-powerful woman - the Ruler, GREMLA. Her dictatorship was due in part to the devoted loyalty of her faithful lieutenant ARKOS - together they proved invinsible. But Gremla was flawed - as her power grew, so did her greed and cruelty - at last ARKOS turned - resolved to stop this meglomaniac, to use all his skill and cunning to destroy her empire, subdue her dinasty ... GAME OVER.
